      • draw

        public void draw(java.lang.Object graphicsContext,
                 Dim dimension,
                 BoxManager boxes,
                 boolean midBoxOnly,
                 java.util.Vector<java.lang.Integer> backgroundColors)
        Draw boxes on a Graphics2D context.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface BoxesDrawer
        Parameters:
        graphicsContext - the Graphics2D on which drawing is to take place.
        dimension - the size of the overall grid of boxes.
        boxes - the BoxManager
        midBoxOnly - whether only to draw the midBox.
        backgroundColors - a list of background colors for the box list (a morph's phenotype may have a background color.)
